message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.PF

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper is primarily focused on partitioning in parallel and distributed simulation, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper deals with the problem of load-balancing and communication reduction in simulation models, which is a key concern in systems and control. 
3. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper discusses communication reduction in simulation models, which is related to networking and internet architecture. 
4. cs.SE (Software Engineering) - The paper proposes an adaptive solution for simulation model partitioning, which can be considered as a software engineering problem. 
5. cs.PF (Performance) - The paper evaluates the performance of the proposed mechanism using a reference cost model, which is related to performance evaluation.
